mapper.select: /* M_Listen.xml - getListenList */ SELECT basic.subject_type , basic.title , listen.start_date , listen.end_date , listen.listentime , listen.gift_ruby , member.mem_nick FROM tb_member_broadcast_basic basic , tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting broad , tb_member_broadcast_listening listen , tb_member_basic member WHERE basic.mem_no = broad.mem_no AND broad.room_no = listen.room_no AND listen.mem_no = member.mem_no
